name: Go Deep!
description:
“All I want to do is to Go Deep! Avoiding bones and getting diamonds to keeping me alive so I can make a higher score.”

Every time you collide your ship is damaged!

After you collide 3 times your ship is destroyed!

Every 10 diamonds you get you recover your ship!

You accumulate diamonds if your ship is intact!

Use WASD to move your ship!


PS This game was made for the Ludum Dare 48! The first jam with my son <3
